question: Read the passage below and choose the most appropriate transition word or phrase to fill in the blank.
text: Modern robotics often relies on sensor-based feedback to ensure precise movement and positioning. Researchers at MIT have developed robots that can fine-tune their grip in real time using advanced tactile sensors. _____ even the most delicate objects can be handled without damage.
explanation: Correct choice B: "Consequently." Because of the real-time adjustments provided by the sensors, the robots can handle delicate objects safelyâ€”this is a cause-and-effect relationship. "In other words" simply restates something. "Conversely" signals an opposite idea, and "Nonetheless" signals a concession or contrast.
